Roy Michael Harrison (amụrụ n'afọ 1948) OBE FRS FRSC FRMetS bụ ónyé nkuzi Britain bụ Queen Elizabeth II Birmingham Centenary Professor of Environmental Health na Mahadum Birmingham na UK na ónyé nkuzi pụrụ íchè na Mahadim Eze Abdulaziz na Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.

Harrison gụrụ akwụkwọ na Henley Grammar School na Mahadum Birmingham ébé e nyèrè ya nzèrè Bachelor of Science na Chemistry na 1969, ya na PhD na Organic chemistry na 1972 na Doctor of Science na Environmental chemistry n'afọ 1989. Nnyocha PhD ya nyochara mmeghachi omume sigmatropic nke tropolone ethers.
Harrison bụ ọkachamara na mmetọ ikuku, na-ahụ màkà mpaghara nke ikuku, gụnyere nanoparticles
Mmasị ya na-agbasa site na isi iyi, site na mgbanwe kemịkal na nke anụ ahụ, na ikpughe mmadụ na mmetụta na ahụike

Ọrụ ya kachasị mkpa bụ n'ọhịa nke ihe ndị na-emepụta ụgbọ ala, gụnyere ihe ndị mejupụtara ha na nhazi ikuku.  Nké a bụ ihe ndabere nke nghọta dị ugbu a banyéré mmekọrịta nké ikuku na oke n'akụkụ ụzọ na nkesa nha.
Na mgbakwunye na iduzi nnukwu ọrụ na diesel exhaust particles, ọ na-etinye ákà na nnukwu ọmụmụ ihe jikọrọ áká nké usoro na-ekpebi ogo ikuku na Beijing na Delhi.
Ọrụ Harrison amatala site na ònyìnyé nkè John Jeyes Medal and Environment Prize nke Royal Society of Chemistry na Fitzroy Prize nke Royal Meteorological Society
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọtụtụ afọ dị ka onyeisi oche na / ma ọ bụ ónyé otu kọmitii ndụmọdụ nke Ngalaba Na-ahụ Màkà Gbụrụ-gbúrụ Ébé Obibi, Nri na Ihe Ndị Dị n'Ime (Defra) na Ngalaba Ahụike
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Order of the British Empire OBE na 2004 New Year Honours màkà ọrụ na sayensị gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi ma họpụta ya dịka Fellow nke Royal Society (FRS) na 2017.
